alert.note: Alert for Lake; McHenry; Northern Cook (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 07 at 3:00AM CST until February 07 at 7:00AM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Wintry mix of freezing drizzle and snow occurring. * WHERE...McHenry, Lake IL and Northern Cook Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM CST this morning. * IMPACTS...The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A thin glaze of ice will result in slippery conditions on area roadways, primarily on untreated and elevated surfaces including bridges and overpasses.
info.instruction: If traveling early this morning, remain alert for changing road conditions and allow extra time to reach your destination. The latest road conditions for Illinois can be obtained on the internet at www.gettingaroundillinois.com.
